message.content:
cs.MM, cs.IR, cs.CV, cs.HC, cs.CL

The paper deals with the segmentation and indexing of instructional videos, which involves multimedia analysis (cs.MM) and information retrieval (cs.IR) techniques. The use of visual filters and clustering algorithms for segmenting the videos also involves computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.CL) techniques. Finally, the paper presents a novel user interface for visualizing the segmented content, which involves human-computer interaction (cs.HC) techniques.
